publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2244 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Video Highland-That the Parliament affirms its support for Video Highland and its production, Iona and Staffa: Islands in the Hebridean Sea; notes that Video Highland produces its work entirely on the West Coast, and recognises that this is an example of the entrepreneurial and professional endeavours that continue to develop in the Highlands and Islands.
S1M-2244 Video Highland (lodged on 21 September 2001) Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2244 Video Highland (lodged on 21 September 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Tricia Marwick*, Dr Elaine Murray*
S1M-2244 Video Highland (lodged on 21 September 2001) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Michael Russell*

S1M-2244 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Video Highland-That the Parliament affirms its support for Video Highland and its production, Iona and Staffa: Islands in the Hebridean Sea; notes that Video Highland produces its work entirely on the West Coast, and recognises that this is an example of the entrepreneurial and professional endeavours that continue to develop in the Highlands and Islands. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Ms Sandra White, Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Michael Russell, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2244 Video Highland (lodged on 21 September 2001) Kay Ullrich*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2244 Video Highland (lodged on 21 September 2001) Richard Lochhead*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2244 Video Highland (lodged on 21 September 2001) Mary Scanlon*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-2244 Video Highland (lodged on 21 September 2001) Linda Fabiani*
